verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:28
verses.text: So Joab blew a trumpet, and all the people stood still, and pursued after Israel no more, neither fought they any more.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:29
verses.text: And Abner and his men walked all that night through the plain, and passed over Jordan, and went through all Bithron, and they came to Mahanaim.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:30
verses.text: And Joab returned from following Abner: and when he had gathered all the people together, there lacked of David’s servants nineteen men and Asahel.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:31
verses.text: But the servants of David had smitten of Benjamin, and of Abner’s men, so that three hundred and threescore men died.
